Summary: It just vanish I took a few pictures on my phone though.
divs: Sighting DetailsI went to get in my car in front of my home and noticed 6-10 orange glowing lights formed in groups of 3 then change to a line. I ran inside to get my dad since he was a pilot his whole life and my children came out as well and my dad confirmed they were not planes after a few minutes he went inside to get out friends we had over and I was just trying to get a few pictures but they started disappearing into thin air. By the time he came back all a once they vanished just completely. I have a 2 second video and several images. I've seen sightings since it happened and many more images. I was so shocked and amazed after it I could barely speak. My voice was shaky it was the most amazing thing I've ever seen!
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
